messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/17/2002 10:39:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... OR....we can rebel!  My mother is one of those chickens. I cringe at the thought! I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/17/2002 10:39:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
dawn@... writes:
> Also what does this show our children, both boys and girls. They learn the
> majority of life skills from us and if a wife is running around like a
> chicken with her head cut off to try and give her husband what he wants it
> sets up unhealthy relationships and expectations for the kids. Boys can
> assume they will be with someone who will constantly try to please them
> and
> girls learn it's their job to please men.... Don't believe me? Read some
> psychological books

OR....we can rebel! <G> My mother is one of those chickens. I cringe at the
thought! I think it "worked" with my brother, though!

Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
